text: The men's team sabre competition at the 2014 Asian Games in Goyang was held on 24 September at the Goyang Gymnasium. ==Schedule== All times are Korea Standard Time (UTC+09:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=150|Event |- | rowspan=4|Wednesday, 24 September 2014 || 12:20 || Round of 16 |- | 13:40 || Quarterfinals |- | 15:00 || Semifinals |- | 19:10 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Gold medal match |} ==Seeding== The teams were seeded taking into account the results achieved by competitors representing each team in the individual event. {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !rowspan=2 width=40|Rank !rowspan=2 width=250|Team !colspan=2|Fencer !rowspan=2 width=40|Total |- !width=40|1 !width=40|2 |- |1||align=left| ||1||2||3 |- |2||align=left| ||3||7||10 |- |3||align=left| ||5||6||11 |- |4||align=left| ||3||12||15 |- |5||align=left| ||8||9||17 |- |6||align=left| ||11||14||25 |- |6||align=left| ||10||15||25 |- |8||align=left| ||16||20||36 |- |9||align=left| ||13||—||37 |- |10||align=left| ||18||21||39 |} ==Results== ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=250|Team |- | |align=left| Gu Bon-gil Kim Jung-hwan Oh Eun-seok Won Woo-young |- | |align=left| Mojtaba Abedini Farzad Baher Ali Pakdaman Mohammad Rahbari |- | |align=left| Cyrus Chang Lam Hin Chung Low Ho Tin Yan Hon Pan |- | |align=left| Fang Xin Sun Wei Tan Sheng Xu Yingming |- |5||align=left| Yevgeniy Frolov Yerali Tilenshiyev Zhanserik Turlybekov |- |6||align=left| Nguyễn Văn Tiến Nguyễn Xuân Lợi Tô Đức Anh Vũ Thành An |- |7||align=left| Ryo Miyayama Tomohiro Shimamura Kenta Tokunan |- |8||align=left| Abdullah Al-Shamali Khaled Al-Shamlan Yousef Al-Shamlan |- |9||align=left| Nasr Al-Saadi Ahmed Al-Siddiq Abdullah Barzegar Ahmad Salmanpour |- |10||align=left| Meshari Al-Bashir Adel Al-Mutairi Aqeel Al-Neamah Ahmed Al-Qudihi |} ==References== *Men's Team Sabre Results ==External links== *Official website Men sabre
title: Fencing at the 2014 Asian Games – Men's team sabre
